strings.s: Do you need something, Mr ?
What do you think of ?
I'm curious... What do you think of ?
Oh... Miss ? She is gorgeous, isn't she?
Her hair is beautiful, her serious expression is cute... Her body... so fit and hot and...
And... and...
Yeah... I agree...
I... shouldn't be saying these things... Mr Winston says that it's not appropriate on many levels....
Nah... Don't listen to that old hag...
Tee hee... You better not let him hear you calling him that, Mr ...
He's too old to understand...
Yeah... Maybe you're right...
What do you do after work?
So... Mia... What do you do after work?
Well... I like to take a steamy shower... eat a hot dinner... and then relax in my comfy clothes...
Yeah... But what I mean is...
Oh! I also like to browse my Instagram and watch cat videos and...
Okay... Okay... We can talk about this later...
About bedroom key...
Uh... ... I'm supposed to drop off some gear in bedroom, but the door seems to be locked...
I believe you have a spare key, right? May I borrow it to get the job done...
The key to her bedroom? I... I'm not supposed to...
Oh, come on... I know you aren't a jobsworth like ... I won't take long up there...
But... What if she finds out? I don't wanna get on her bad side...
Don't worry... She's at the pool now and won't come back for awhile...
Oh my God! At the pool!? She's probably wearing one of those sexy bikinis I saw in her wardobre! I'd do anything to see her wearing one of those...
Well... What if I snap some pics of her at the pool for you... Would you give me the bedroom key for a few minutes?
I... I shouldn't, but... I already feel tingles thinking about these pictures...
We have a deal, then! I'll bring some hot bikini pics for you!
Yes... Please... I'll be waiting...
Where are the pictures you promised?
I'm working on it!
Hello... Guess what? I have a surprise for you...
What do you... GASP...
Oh my God... Did you really managed to...
Hey... You sound like you didn't believe I could do this...
Oh my God... Oh my God... I want! I want! I want!
Easy... You remember our agreement, right?
Yes... Here's the key... Now give me the pictures... NOW!
Okay, girl... Easy... Here they are...
Oh my God... So beautiful... Look at those...
Yeah... So hot... What about we go together check the...
and I could be at this pool, and she could ask me to apply sunscreen on her, up and down her legs... and untie her top to get her back... and...
Sigh... Looks like someone here is a bit obsessed with Miss ...
Well... At least I have the bedroom key... Let's get in there!
Mr ? Did you already find a piece to improve my shrine?
I... I'm working on it...
Please... Do this for me... I promise I'll show it to you when it's ready!
Oh my GOD, Mr !! Did you just see Miss showing her skin to us!? I could barely hold a huge scream!!
Oh yeah... That was awesome... And I'm proud of your self-control, by the way...
Please... Now help me find a perfect piece to complete my shrine... I promise I'll show it to you when it's ready!
Oh my GOD, Mr !! The way Miss squeezed you... YOU HAVE TO TELL ME WHAT YOU DID FOR THAT REACTION!!
Hey... Easy... She was just missing home... And I just gained a little bit of her trust these days...
I wanted a hug like that too... But, for now I'll be statisfied if you help me find a perfect piece to complete my shrine... I promise I'll show it to you when it's ready!
Any news during my long shift at the computer terminal?
So, ... Heard any news during my long shift at the computer terminal?
Nah... I didn't have any free time... This house is so big that when I finish cleaning the last room, the first one is full of dust again...
And I can feel like if is observing me all the time... Even when I'm into my room...
Well... He's a creepy dude, so I can relate to that...
I found panties as requested... Should I give it to her?
Hey
Yes, Mister
I bet you can't guess the lost treasure I just found at a certain place in this manor...
Treasure? Miss keeps so many old trinkets here that I can't even say what is treasure and ...
Wait... You're trying to say that you have found...
I'll give you a tip... I found it in her always locked closet...
OH MY GOD...
Give... Give... Give...
GIVE IT TO ME!!!
Whoah... Whoah... Easy there... Let's not startle the hole mansion...
GIVE IT TO HER
NOT NOW
ASK FOR A 'REWARD'
You see... Getting my hands in these panties were not an easy job...
Don't you think I deserve a 'reward' first?
A reward? Like what? I don't have anything to give you...
Well... You know... I'm sure a hot chick like you can think about something to make a guy's day better...
Hmm... I know what you mean...
And of course I can do what you want for her panties... Stay right there...
Yeah... I'm glad we reached an understanding, You have such a nice touch...
Really... What about this?
Whoah... Whoah... Go easy on the merchandise! Ouch!
Mister I admire a man who is not afraid to use his resources to get what he wants...
Uuhh... Thank you?
Ouch!
But you must understand that I'm not the 'sub' type... Actually, I'm quite the opposite...
And these hands never go to a man's crotch to caress his dirty cock, but only to crush his stinky balls...
Whoah... Okay... Okay... I get it... I get it...
Do you want this... 'hot chick'... to tight the grip even more?
Nope... It's definetively tight enough...
Will you be an obedient boy and give me Miss panties?
Anything you want, mistress...
Okay... Jeez... Just take it...
Good boy... You understand respect... I like it...
Humpf... You still have a lot to learn, Mister
Here it is... I hope you like it...
Oh my God!! I can't believe it... I can't believe it!!
Mmmm.... It's like a dream...
I can smell her... I can feel her... So good...
Uuuhh... I think I'll just leave then...
NO!!!
Ouch!! Come on... Give a break here...
You might think I'm stupid, Mister But I know exactly what you're trying to do here...
Uuuhh... What do you...
I noticed Miss behavior changing since you started working here...
What!? I think you're seeing way beyond the...
Shhh... Just shut up and listen, boy!
I know you're trying to get into Miss pants... I can see you may even have the skill to actually do it...
And I want you to use this 'skill' of yours to... to...
You know damn well what I want you to do next... If you can make her have a change of mind like this... Then you're able to convince her to allow me get in the game too...
Whoah... That's uuuh... A quite interesting request, but...
JUST DO IT, BOY!!
Okay... Okay... I'll work on it...
Good... Don't disappoint me!! I'll be waiting!!
Now... I'll be in my room for several hours having a date with these wonderful panties... Tee hee... Bye...
Jesus Christ... should demand psychological evaluations before hiring people for her staff... That girl is an obsessive compulsive bipolar psycho...
I can't deny her next request is quite interesting, though... And if I work more on her trust, maybe I can bend her 'dom' side and have some fun myself in the process...
LEAVE
See you later, Mia...
